trigger_event: Code commit to a feature branch
success_criteria: >80% unit test coverage; 100% unit tests passing; No critical issues in linter/SonarQube.
escalation_procedure: Developer is notified automatically; PR cannot be merged.
business_impact: Prevents basic defects and code quality issues from entering the main codebase.

success_criteria: 100% integration tests passing; 100% critical path E2E smoke tests passing; No new critical/high vulnerabilities from container scan.
failure_action: Automatically roll back the deployment; Create P1 incident.
escalation_procedure: On-call engineer is paged; Incident lead is assigned.
business_impact: Prevents major regressions and security flaws from reaching the pre-production environment.

success_criteria: All staging gates passed; Full E2E regression suite has >98% pass rate; Manual exploratory testing completed and signed off by QA lead; Performance load tests meet NFRs; Product Owner signs off on UAT.
failure_action: Abort production release; Schedule emergency planning meeting.
responsible_team: Release Manager, QA Lead, Product Owner
business_impact: Final quality checkpoint to ensure release readiness and prevent production incidents.
